mapper.select: SELECT g.goods_cd ,g.goods_ctg_cd ,c.goods_ctg_nm ,g.goods_nm ,g.goods_time_con ,g.price ,g.goods_expiration_date ,g.goods_insert_date FROM goods AS g INNER JOIN goods_ctg AS c ON g.goods_ctg_cd = c.goods_ctg_cd WHERE g.goods_cd = #{goodsCd};
